titleStmt.title: A letter to the trew professors of Christes Gospell, inhabitinge in the parishe off Allhallowis, in Bredstrete in London, made by Thomas Sampson, sometyme their pastore
titleStmt.author: Sampson, Thomas, 1517?-1589.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Joos Lambrecht?] at the signe of the golde[n] Bibell,
publicationStmt.pubPlace: Imprynted at Strasburgh in Elsas [i.e. Wesel? :
publicationStmt.date: in the moneth of Auguste. the yeare of our Lord. 1554.

notesStmt.note: Actual place of publication and printer's name conjectured by STC.
The last two leaves are blank.

Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
